text:
="preserve">Jay Street Metrotech is a station on the IND Culver Line, IND Fulton Street Line and BMT Fourth Avenue Line of the New York City Subway. Located at the intersection of Jay Street, Willoughby Street and MetroTech in Downtown Brooklyn.
It is served by the A, C, F and R trains
This station is for A, C, F and R trains
Next stations after this station on the IND Culver Line, IND Fulton Street Line and BMT Fourth Avenue Line: DeKalb Avenue, Bergen Street, Hoyt Schermerhorn Streets, York Street, Court Street and High Street.
